item.description:
@timeorspace wrote:

Just wondering if anyone has done anything using one of the LED matrices... like this:

adafruit.com

Small 1.2" 8x8 Bi-Color (Red/Green) Square LED Matrix

Make a scrolling sign, or a small video display with this 8x8 gridded bi-color LED matrix. Only 1.2" on a side, it is quite visible but not so large it wont plug into a breadboard! ...


I can see uses in a sequencer type application (or many others) and realize it would still need a driver chip but don’t know how to approach it. Easy enough with Arduino but how to have the Axo do the talking?
